attributes.action: seriously press for the establishment of a functioning ceasefire and the effective deployment of the AU/UN hybrid force in the Darfur region.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly:
1) Ensure the safety of all displaced persons in the internally displaced persons (IDP) camps, including those in Chad.
2) Protect the remaining civilian populations from national and rebel military actions.
3) Pressurise the ruling party in Khartoum , the National Congress Party (NCP) – to abandon attempts to achieve a military victory.
4) Pressurize the Sudan Liberation Army and other rebel groups to accept a UN/AU enforced peace treaty.

The British Government should be fully supporting (with all realistic material assistance) the AU/UN mediation as the sole international forum for pursuing a peaceful Darfur settlement. Through suitable means develop consensus for a political strategy, including the application of punitive measures against those responsible.
